headline.print_headline: Activist’s Mother in Thailand Faces Long Prison Term for One-Word Facebook Reply
headline.main: Thai Activist’s Mother Faces Prison Term for One-Word Facebook Reply

docs.abstract: Patnaree Chankij, mother of pro-democracy activist, is latest victim of Thailand's lese-majeste law and has been arrested for receiving and replying to message on Facebook that insulted monarchy.

docs.snippet: The media research company will include Facebook conversations about TV shows, along with Twitter messages, in its measurement system.

headline.print_headline: Nielsen Using Facebook and Twitter for Ratings
headline.main: Nielsen to Use Facebook and Twitter in New Ratings System

docs.abstract: Nielsen is set to announce that it is working with Facebook to include conversations on social network about television in its measurement system; company's new metric will also include activity on Twitter related to television.
